item.name: TFS_33_App user should be able to upload delivery image

request.description:
Objective: As an app user, I want to upload an image against the completed delivery so that I can assure the company admin that this delivery is completed successfully.

Acceptance Criteria: 
I should be able to take a picture of the delivery place or invoice.
After uploading the image I can complete the delivery action item and update on the FFM app.
Dependency:
App users should be able to log in to the FFM through valid credentials.

Steps: 
Open postman
Open Folder (Field Force Management)
Open a new tab 
Add API URL
Select body, Select "raw"
Paste payload in the body.
Select method: POST 
Select the Authorization tab
Select type: Bearer Token
Paste the token: (User login API)
Hit the "Send" button to execute the API

API Specification: 
API URL:  /api/v1/field-force/delivery/deliveries/avatar/upload/{user_id}/{delivery_id}
Method: Post

(Note: For user_id as a registered user you need to login through "3.2 User Login" API then authenticate the user through "authenticate user" API. And for deliver_id it will get from "1.4 GET User Delivery List" API.)

Body: 
          For input payload,
          body-->form-data and select key=File and name it "image"
          value="select files" from computer

Expected Result:
{
    "success": true,
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "Photos added successfully",
    "fileUrl": "https://files.techserve4u.com/66c60ec0-9a04-4782-8165-9de860a58c4dScreen_Shot_2020-11-25_at_7.55.35_PM.png"
}
